alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 6:56PM EDT until September 08 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Worcester County in central Massachusetts... Northwestern Middlesex County in northeastern Massachusetts... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 656 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Petersham, or 14 miles southeast of Orange, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fitchburg, Gardner, Athol, Winchendon, Templeton, Westminster, Ashburnham, Barre, Hubbardston, Ashby, Hardwick, Oakham, Phillipston, Royalston, Petersham, and New Braintree. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
